original: skandhadhātvādibuddhānāṃ stūpa ityabhidhīyate || (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 19)
analyzed: skandha dhātu ādi buddhānām stūpaḥ iti abhidhīyate
samyak samādhiḥ bhagavān śrī herukaḥ

original: eṣa śrīheruko vīro vasantatilakā smṛtā | (va. ti., pṛ. 38)
analyzed: eṣa śrī herukaḥ vīraḥ vasantatilakā smṛtā

original: tatra nirmāṇacakre nābhau sa eva vasanto'kāro hrasvarūpaḥ |
analyzed: tatra nirmāṇa cakre nābhau saḥ eva vasantokāraḥ hrasva rūpaḥ
hṛdi dharmacakre nāda bindu yukta hūṃkāra ākāraḥ

original: saṃbhogacakre kaṇṭhe sa eva trimātraḥ plutaḥ praṇavarūpaḥ |
analyzed: saṃbhoga cakre kaṇṭhe saḥ eva tri mātraḥ plutaḥ praṇava rūpaḥ
nāḍī kauṭilyāt tasya tri parivartaḥ caṇḍālyāḥ praveśāt nirgamāt ca iti kṛtvā
lalāṭe mahā sukha cakre bindu nāda vibhūṣita ūna ahata akṣaraḥ haṃkāraḥ

original: tadeva vilomena śiraḥkaṇṭhahṛdayanābhirūpaḥ śrīheruko mantramūrtiḥ | (va. ti.ṭī., pṛ. 38-39)
analyzed: tat eva vilomena śiraḥ kaṇṭha hṛdaya nābhi rūpaḥ śrī herukaḥ mantra mūrtiḥ

original: pādāṅgulibhyo'bhedyahūkārarūpasya medasaḥ pravartakatvāt śrīherukaḥ | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 49)
analyzed: medasaḥ pravartaka tvāt śrīherukaḥ

original: kāyatrayasvabhāvo bhagavān śrīherukaḥ | (va. ti. ṭī., pṛ. 86)

analyzed: hevajram

original: hekāreṇa mahākaruṇā vajraṃ prajñā ca bhaṇyate |
analyzed: hekāreṇa mahā karuṇā vajram prajñā ca bhaṇyate
prajñā upāya ātmakam tantram he ta
hekāram iti mahā karuṇām
vajram sarva dharma śūnyatām
homaḥ

analyzed: prajñā agnau caṇḍālī jvalana tīkṣṇa tvāt dāha ujjvale homa usau vijñeyaḥ
